meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of calligraphy.
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed a calligraphic style in her elegant lettering.
meanings.sent2: The wedding invitation featured beautiful calligraphic writing.
meanings.sent3: The calligraphic pen danced across the paper, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her calligraphic strokes painted a picture of grace and sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The calligraphic script was so intricate, it seemed like a work of art.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to beautiful handwriting.
meanings.sent1: His calligraphic handwriting was admired by all his classmates.
meanings.sent2: The love letter was written in a calligraphic style that touched her heart.
meanings.sent3: The calligraphic notes on the card made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her calligraphic penmanship was like poetry on the page.
meanings.sent5: The calligraphic writing was so neat and precise, it looked like a printed font.

meanings.definition: Written in a flowing, decorative style.
meanings.sent1: The calligraphic font on the menu added a touch of elegance to the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The certificate was adorned with calligraphic swirls and flourishes.
meanings.sent3: The calligraphic design on the wall was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her calligraphic patterns seemed to dance across the page.
meanings.sent5: The calligraphic decorations transformed the room into a work of art.
